com.att.research.xacml.api.pip

Interface PIPEngine

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurableEngine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConformancePIPEngine, CSVEngine, EnvironmentEngine, HyperCSVEngine, JDBCEngine, LDAPEngine, RequestEngine, StdConfigurableEngine, XacmlCSVEngine

    public interface PIPEngine
    PIPEngine is the interface that objects implement that do look-up of Attributes.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<PIPRequest> attributesProvided()
      Returns a list of PIPRequest objects that the Engine can return.
      java.util.Collection<PIPRequest> attributesRequired()
      Returns a list of PIPRequests required by the Engine to return an attribute(s).
      PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPFinder pipFinder)
      Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets the String description of this PIPEngine.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the String name identifying this PIPEngine.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the String name identifying this PIPEngine. Names do not need to be unique.
        Returns:
        the String name of this PIPEngine>

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the String description of this PIPEngine.
        Returns:
        the String description of this PIPEngine.

      • attributesRequired

        java.util.Collection<PIPRequest> attributesRequired()
        Returns a list of PIPRequests required by the Engine to return an attribute(s).
        Returns:
        Collection of required attributes

      • attributesProvided

        java.util.Collection<PIPRequest> attributesProvided()
        Returns a list of PIPRequest objects that the Engine can return.
        Returns:
        Collection of provided attributes

      • getAttributes

        PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                        PIPFinder pipFinder)
                          throws PIPException
        Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest. The PIPResponse may contain multiple Attributes and they do not need to match the PIPRequest. In this way, a PIPEngine may compute multiple related Attributes at once.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest defining which Attributes should be retrieved
        pipFinder - the PIPFinder to use for retrieving supporting attribute values
        Returns:
        a com.att.research.xacml.pip.PIPResponse with the results of the request
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes.
